overview: Edgardo is a frustrated artist turned cab driver in Buenos Aires, who spends his messy nocturnal life in shady dumps, that distract him from his otherwise constant self-loathing. When he turns fifty, he decides to look for Salvador, his son. His life will take an unexpected turn when he meets Gala, a transvestite tango singer that will bring back Edgardo's inspiration and passion for art.
tagline: Edgardo is a frustrated artist turned cab driver in Buenos Aires. When he turns fifty, he decides to look for Salvador, his son.
title: Salvador
